parameters.name: ListenerIds
parameters.description: The listener IDs. You can specify at most 20 listener IDs.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerIds
parameters.description: The ALB instance ID. You can specify at most 20 instance IDs.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return. This parameter is optional. Valid values: **1 to 100**. If you do not specify this parameter, the default value **20** is used.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   If a value is returned for NextToken, you must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.
